# Custom Modes

Rotate the mode dial to any of modes C1 (CUSTOM 1) through C4 (CUSTOM 4) to take pictures using previously-saved shooting menu settings.

!Mode Dial

## Mode Selection: Still Photography or Movie

Choose whether the selected custom settings bank (C1 through C4) is for still photography (ðŸ“· STILL) or movie recording (ðŸŽ¥ MOVIE).

1. Navigate to **IMAGE QUALITY SETTING** in the photo menus, highlight ðŸ“· **CUSTOM MODE SETTING**, and press **MENU/OK**.

   > You can also use ðŸŽ¥ **MOVIE SETTING** > ðŸ“· **CUSTOM MODE SETTING** in the movie menus.

   !Custom Mode Setting

2. Highlight the desired custom settings bank and press **MENU/OK**.

3. Highlight ðŸ“· **STILL** or ðŸŽ¥ **MOVIE** and press **MENU/OK**.  
   The selected custom settings bank can now be used for still photography or movie recording.

   !Still or Movie Selection
